panels.description: A weighted score over the selected timeframe taking into account all new errors, increasing errors and transaction slowdowns. Weights are defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Reliability Score

panels.description: The ratio between selected transaction volume and the number of transaction failures. Transaction failures are defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Failed Transactions

panels.description: The number of selected transactions whose avg time has increased by more than the critical slowdown threshold (as defined in the Settings dashboard) compared to the baseline period.
panels.title: Slow Transactions

panels.description: The number of new errors detected in the selected timeframe.
panels.title: New Errors

panels.description: Errors whose rate (i.e. times / calls) has increased significantly in the selected timeframe. The thresholds to control what is considered to be an increase are set in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Error Increases

panels.description: The number of unique errors of the currently selected types ($type)
panels.title: Unique Errors

panels.description: The number of calls into each of the selected transactions in the left Y axis correlated to $metricNames on the right Y Axis
panels.title: $tc Unique Transactions, Throughput= $tv

panels.description: The number of errors in the selected apps on the left Y axis correlated to $metricNames on the right Y axis. If no applications are selected, the first $splitLimit key applications are charted. Key applications are defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Errors By App

panels.description: The response time of the selected transactions overlaid on the number of calls (throughput) into them.
panels.title: Response Time ($ta avg, baseline: $tba)

panels.description:
Chart errors according to key code tiers (e.g. AWS, SQL, Tomcat,..) on the left Y axis correlated to $metricNames on the right Y axis. 

Key code tiers are defined in the Settings dashboard. If no key tiers are defined, then 3rd party code tiers (as defined  [here](https://git.io/fpPT0) ) with the most errors are charted.
panels.title: Exceptions By Tier

panels.description: The number of errors transaction failures in the selected transactions on the left Y axis correlated to $metricNames on the right Y axis. Transaction failures types are defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: $tfc Unique Failures ,Volume = $tf

panels.description: The number of critical exceptions within the selected transactions on the left Y axis correlated to $metricNames on the right Y axis. The list of critical exception types is defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: $cec Critical Exceptions, Volume = $ce
